description: Golden crunchy vegetable latkes make a delicious starter or snack. Dip them in creamy herbed sour cream for a treat for your tastebuds.
name: Vegetable Latkes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Separate parsley leaves and stems and three-quarters of the dill leaves and stems, reserving remainder, then finely chop. Combine vegetables, herb stems, zest, seeds, potato flakes and egg in a large bowl. Season.

Pour enough oil into a large, deep frying pan to come 1cm up side of pan. Heat over medium heat. Working in batches, place 1/4 cupfuls of vegetable mixture in pan. Cook for 3 minutes on each side or until golden and cooked through. Transfer to a wire rack. Repeat with remaining vegetable mixture to make a total of 9 latkes.

HowToTip.tipText: We used a mixture of potato, parsnip, carrot and sweet potato to make these latkes.

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, place sour cream, lemon juice and herb leaves in a food processor and process until combined. Serve latkes with herbed sour cream and remaining dill.
